suncertify.presentation
Class BookingViewImp

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.presentation.BookingViewImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookingView
public class BookingViewImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements BookingView

This class implements the BookingView and therefore must implement the methods in this interface. It is used in the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application. It contains several methods that renders the data contained or represented by the model using any choice of GUI that implements BookingGui.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Black
